ij.gui
Class Overlay

java.lang.Object
  ij.gui.Overlay

public class Overlay
extends java.lang.Object

An Overlay is a list of Rois that can be drawn non-destructively on an Image.

Constructor Summary
Overlay()
          Constructs an empty Overlay.
Overlay(Roi roi)
          Constructs an Overlay and adds the specified Roi.
